name: Bow to Blood: Last Captain Standing
description: Become a Captain! Fly your ship and command your crew as you compete to become Champion in a winner-takes-all reality show. Build relationships and plot betrayals to avoid getting voted off the season and become the last captain standing. Optional VR support.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i5-5200U 2.2 Ghz  (For Optional VR - Intel Core i5-4590 (AMD FX 8350)) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 (Optional VR - GeForce GTX 970) DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 3.2 Ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 750ti (Optional VR - GeForce GTX 970) DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 4 GB available space
